name: Prepared Puppet: Eight Waves of Needles

{{Infobox/Jutsu |image=Eight Waves of Needles.png |kanji=仕込み傀儡・針々八波 |unnamed jutsu=No |romaji=Shikomi Kugutsu: Shinshin Happa |literal english=Prepared Puppet: Eight Waves of Needles |game names=Mechanical Puppet: Octo Needle Waves
Poison Senbon StreamNaruto Trading Card Game |parent jutsu=Puppet Technique |jutsu classification=Ninjutsu, Shurikenjutsu |jutsu class type=Offensive |jutsu range=Short, Mid, Long |users=Sasori~~puppet~Hiruko |debut manga=265 |boruto=No |debut anime=20 |debut shippuden=Yes |boruto anime=No |game debut=Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja 4 |jutsu media=Anime, Manga, Game }} Sasori, while inside of his puppet [[Hiruko]], makes the puppet spit a rapid stream of countless [[senbon]] from its mouth, in a fashion similar to a machine gun. These senbon can be poisoned for increased lethality. == Trivia == * Despite not being named in the anime or manga, it was named in video games and the ''[[Naruto Collectible Card Game]]''. == References == [[es:Marioneta Preparada: Ocho Ondas de Agujas]] [[de:Shikomi Kugutsu: Shinshin Happa]] [[fr:Pantin - Huit Salves d'Aiguilles]] [[pl:Shikomi Kugutsu: Shinshin Happa]]
